pages.text: Everything has its $(l)origin$(), plants and zombies are no exception. Plants are derived from the special effects of $(l)plant seeds and special essences$(), and the special essences are derived from the $(#ff0000)Origin Essences$(). $(m)The source of zombies is currently unknown$(). The Origin Essence is $(l)the origin of most special essences$(). If you want to obtain it, you have to find the answer from the $(#ff0000)saplings$().

pages.title: Origin Ore
pages.text: During the growth of saplings, some saplings may absorb too much energy and overflow. Eventually, the saplings will fail to grow, and an $(#ff0000)Origin Ore$() full of energy will accumulate in the dirt below the saplings.Use a $(l)Diamond-level Pickaxe$() to dig the Origin Ore to obtain a small amount of $(#ff0000)Origin Essences$(). You can also find some ores on the ground.

pages.title: Origin Essence
pages.text: $(l)Origin Essence$() has a certain amount of $(l)radioactivity$(). It can radiate $(l)plant seeds$() and other items to make them alienate. However, a single original essence is not enough to obtain special essences, and they must be synthesized into $(#ff0000)Original Block$() with strong radiation.

pages.title: Origin Block
pages.text: Its radiation has no effect on creatures, but it will $(l)radiate special blocks within 1 block around it as the corresponding Essence Ore$(). Due to the instability of its radiation, the time when the surrounding squares are changed is also different.
The result of all special blocks after radiation

The above list does not include all special essences (such as $(#ff0000)Electric Essence$()), which is obtained in a special way and will be updated later. It can be seen that there are currently 14 special essences: $(l)appease, light, explosion, defense, ice, enforce, toxic, assist, magic, flame, spear, arma, and electric, shadow$() which is not yet available.
